text: Venezuela was first at the Olympic Games in 1948 and has been in every Summer Olympic Games since. Venezuela has also been in the Winter Olympic Games since 1998. The National Olympic Committee for Venezuela was formed in 1935. ==Medalists== Medal Name Games Sport Event 1952 Helsinki Athletics Men's triple jump 1960 Rome Shooting Men's 50 metre rifle prone 1968 Mexico City Boxing Men's light flyweight 1976 Montreal Boxing Men's welterweight 1980 Moscow Boxing Men's bantamweight 1984 Los Angeles Boxing Men's light flyweight 1984 Los Angeles Boxing Men's featherweight 1984 Los Angeles Swimming Men's 200m butterfly 2004 Athens Taekwondo Women's heavyweight 2004 Athens Weightlifting Men's featherweight Dalia Contreras 2008 Beijing Taekwondo Women −49 kg Rubén Limardo 2012 London Fencing Men's épée ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes ==References== ==Other websites== * * Venezuela profile at London2012.com Category:Nations at the Olympics Category:National sports teams of Venezuela Category:1935 establishments Category:1948 establishments in Venezuela Category:1998 establishments
title: Venezuela at the Olympics
